## Ruff linter

[Ruff](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff) is an incredibly fast linter. It's since Ruff that I actually start to use a Python linter instead of turning off the annoying warnings.

For VSCode integration I use [ruff-vscode](https://github.com/astral-sh/ruff-vscode).
